name: enrichment_models (ntropy-network)
description: [项目级] This repository benchmark Ntropy API against different Large Language Models (OpenAI ChatGPT and LLAMA finetuned models). It also contains an easy to use wrapper to enable using the LLMs to perform transaction enrichment. Llama adapters were open sourced and are available on huggingface hub.。来源: https://github.com/ntropy-network/enrichment_models

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
This repository benchmark Ntropy API against different Large Language Models (OpenAI ChatGPT and LLAMA finetuned models). It also contains an easy to use wrapper to enable using the LLMs to perform transaction enrichment. Llama adapters were open sourced and are available on huggingface hub.

来源: https://github.com/ntropy-network/enrichment_models
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 33
